definitions: a person or thing situated away or detached from the main body or system
shortDefinitions: person or thing situated away or detached from main body or system

definitions: a person or thing differing from all other members of a particular group or set

examples.text: an outlier in Faulkner's body of work
then there are the corporate outliers, people who just don't fit into the culture of the company

shortDefinitions: person or thing differing from other members of group or set

definitions: a younger rock formation isolated among older rocks.
shortDefinitions: younger rock formation isolated among older rocks

definitions: a data point on a graph or in a set of results that is very much bigger or smaller than the next nearest data point.
shortDefinitions: data point on graph or in set of results
